content:
Wonderful question! Guided meditation can be a fantastic way to calm your mind and reduce anxiety. Here are some popular apps and websites that offer guided meditation sessions:

**Apps:**

1. **Headspace**: A well-known app that offers personalized meditation sessions for anxiety, stress, and sleep. (Free trial, then subscription)
2. **Calm**: Features guided meditations, sleep stories, and relaxing music to help you unwind. (Free trial, then subscription)
3. **Insight Timer**: A free app with a vast library of guided meditations, as well as a timer for tracking your personal practice.
4. **Meditation Studio**: Offers a variety of guided meditations, including those specifically for anxiety, depression, and sleep. (Free, with in-app purchases)
5. **Buddhify**: Provides guided meditations for different parts of your day, such as waking up, going to bed, or taking a break at work. (One-time purchase, no subscription)

**Websites:**

1. **Mindful.org**: Offers guided meditations, articles, and courses on mindfulness and meditation. (Free, with some premium content)
2. **UCLA Mindful Awareness Research Center**: Features free guided meditations from various instructors, including those specifically for anxiety and stress.
3. **Omvana**: A website and app that offers guided meditations, as well as a library of relaxing sounds and music. (Free, with premium content available)
4. **Rainy Mood**: A website that provides guided meditations, as well as calming rain sounds to help you relax. (Free, with premium content available)
5. **Guided Meditation by Andrew Johnson**: A website offering a range of free guided meditations, including those for anxiety, stress, and sleep.

Remember, you can always try out a few options to see which one resonates with you the most. Consistency is key, so find a guided meditation platform that you enjoy and make it a regular part of your routine.

If you're new to meditation, consider starting with short sessions (5-10 minutes) and gradually increasing the duration as you become more comfortable with the practice.
